name: AVAudioUnitDelay
desc: An object that implements a delay effect.

items.name: var delayTime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The time for the input signal to reach the output.

items.name: var feedback: Float
items.desc: The amount of the output signal that feeds back into the delay line.

items.name: var lowPassCutoff: Float
items.desc: The cutoff frequency above which high frequency content rolls off, in hertz.

items.name: var wetDryMix: Float
items.desc: The blend of the wet and dry signals.
